info.title: Backbone SKU Usage API
info.description:
- alpha: Currently developed API version. Subject to major changes.
- beta: A semi-stable early access version. New features can be added. Breaking changes are possible.
- stable: The API is recommended for use in production.

[Changelog](https://sku-usage-api.conqore.niceshops.com/v2/docs/changelog.html)

All data is transferred in UTF-8 encoding.\
The API uses stateless HTTP. No cookies have to be kept.\
Authentication via OAuth2 client credentials flow.

[Privacy Policy](https://www.niceshops.com/en/dienstleistungen/data-privacy-policy)

[Backbone SKU Usage API PHP client @Packagist](https://packagist.org/packages/datenkraft/bb-sku-usage-api-php-client)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page to read. Default is the first page.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The maximum size per page is 100. Default is 100.

parameters.name: paginationMode
parameters.description:
The paginationMode to use:
- default: The total number of items in the collection will not be calculated.
- totalCount: The total number of items in the collection will be calculated. This can mean loss of performance.

parameters.name: filter[endpoint]
parameters.description: A filter for restricting the audit log to a endpoint.

parameters.name: filter[version]
parameters.description: A filter for restricting the audit log to a endpoint version.

parameters.name: filter[identifier]
parameters.description: A filter for querying actions for a identifier.

get.summary: Query SKU Usage data by projectId and externalId OR by skuUsageIds. At least one of those two options must be given
get.description: Query SKU Usage data by projectId and externalId OR by skuUsageIds. At least one of those two options must be given

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page to read. Default is the first page.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The maximum size per page is 100. Default is 100.

parameters.name: paginationMode
parameters.description:
The paginationMode to use:
- default: The total number of items in the collection will not be calculated.
- totalCount: The total number of items in the collection will be calculated. This can mean loss of performance.

parameters.name: filter[projectId]
parameters.description: SKUUsage ProjectId filter - Must not be present with filter[skuUsageIds]

parameters.description: SKUUsage SkuUsageIds filter

parameters.description: SKUUsage SkuGroupIds filter

auditLog.description: Data to represent a audit log entry.

endpoint.description: The name of the audited endpoint.

version.description: The version of the audited endpoint.

confidentialContent.description: The GDPR relevant content of the resource.

requestId.description: The optional request ID of the endpoint call.

oauthClientId.description: The OAuth client id which did the change.

auditLogCollection.title: auditLogCollection
auditLogCollection.description: A collection of audit log entries

page.description: The page contained in this collection.

pageSize.description: The page size used for reading the collection.

totalCount.description:
The total number of items in the collection.\
Note: This can be null depending on the used paginationMode.

key.description: The key of the field causing the error

value.description: The value of the field causing the error

fieldReference.description: The exact reference to the field causing the error

identifiers.description: Contains key value pairs for single identifier

externalId.description:
External Id\
Note: This is not required if the skuCode is 'su-manual-correction'.
